#include<bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
#define ll long long int
#define ull unsigned long long int
#define maxN 10004
#define logN 40
#define maxW 1005
#define MOD 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define INF (((ll)1000000000) * ((ll)1000000000))
#define e 2.7182818284590452353602874
#define maxT 100000
 
int F[maxN];
int C[30],S[30];
 
void sieve() {
int i,j;
 
F[1]=1;
for(i=2;i<=10000;i++) 
if( F[i]==0)
for(j=i+i;j<=10000;j+=i)
F[j]=1;	//composite
 
}
 
int main() {
 
cin.sync_with_stdio(0);
cin.tie(0);
 
int T,i,j,N,Q;
 
sieve();
 
cin>>T;
 
while(T--) {
 
string s;
cin>>s;
 
for(i=0;i<28;i++)
S[i]=C[i]=0;
 
for(i=0;i<s.size();i++)
if( s[i]>='a' && s[i]<='z')
S[ s[i]-'a' ]++;	//small letter
else
C[ s[i]-'A' ]++;	//capital letter
 
int max=-1;
 
for(i=0;i<26;i++) {
 if( S[i]>max )
  max=S[i];
 if(C[i]>max)
  max=C[i];
}
 
ll ans=0;
 
for(i=0;i<26;i++)
if( F[S[i]]== F[max] )
ans+=S[i] - S[i]/2;
else
ans+=S[i]; 
 
for(i=0;i<26;i++)
if( F[C[i]]== F[max] )
ans+=C[i] - C[i]/2;
else
ans+=C[i]; 
 
cout<<ans<<"\n";
 
}
 
 
return 0;
}
